sentence.Network_en: Three fundamental cloth properties determine the handle, viz. stiffness, softness and bulkiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 织物的三个基本性质决定手感, 即刚性, 柔软性和膨松性.

sentence.Network_en: In spite of the bulkiness of his body there was a remarkable grace in his movements.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他身材魁梧,但他的动作却特别优雅.

sentence.Network_en: The whole structure of the body gives an impression of depth and solidity without bulkiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 后背相当短,与整个身躯给人的印象是深、而可靠,但不笨重.
